text: == Events == * February 18 – Amda Seyon I, Emperor of Ethiopia begins his campaigns in the southern Muslim provinces (possibly in 1329). * August 10-11 – Battle of Dupplin Moor in Scotland * November 7 – Lucerne joins the Swiss Confederation with Uri, Schwyz, and Unterwalden. * December 16 – Battle of Annan in Scotland. * The city of Târgu Mureş (Romania) was first documented in the papal registry under the name Novum Forum Siculorum.
